ACTION REPORT

November 22, 2000

Items being done this month:

  1. Roof repairs are being done as needed. The start date for the re-roofing of the South end is the end of November/early December.

  2. Cleaning of the entry tiles will be done by in-house staffing.

  3. Reflex has been hard at work, should be done by the end of the month.

    4.

Items to be done next month:

  1. Tile bids are also hard to get but we are still working on it.

  2. Bids are in regarding the final trimming and removal of the Palm trees that touch the buildings.

    3.

Items being done by maintenance:

  1. General maintenance is being completed with light fixtures replaced as needed.

    2.

Items completed last month:

  1. Storerooms are now clean and sorted.

  2. The South Clubhouse has been cleaned and old furniture removed.

  3. Janitorial staff is now in place and functioning.

    4.
